instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Very new to board repair

Green Light on charger 

Decided to start with U7000

R7020: 0 VOLTS
PPDCIN_G3H: 18.5V
Q7080: SOURCE: 18.5V GATE: 17.88 DRAIN: 18.03
Q7085: SOURCE: 18.03V GATE: 17.23 DRAIN: 0V

R7085 actually sparked when I tested it

R7020: 0 VOLTS (PPBUS_G3H_DCINRUSH)

U7000: RESISTANCE PINS 27-28 20.3 OHMS (CURRENT SENSING)

F7040 Fuse: pin 2: 0 V (starts at 1 and slowly drifts to 0)

U7000
PIN 14: SMC_BC_ACOK: 3.27V
PIN 19: 5.1 V 



My thought is that Q7085 is bad. Should have voltage going through it. Without that, no PPBUS_G3H

Am I on the right track?

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Q7085 is blocked; is controlled by U7000.
Post basic voltages for U7000; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.
Also post exact ohm resistance between pins 17/18.

Need to know exact values for R7085/86; ohm scale, measured onboard.

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
"3: 0.206"
Missing ACIN, ISL6259 doesn't work until fix this problem.
Check R7010 and C7011.

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
R7010: 4 kOhm
R7011: 330 Ohm
C7011: 0 uF

R7013 is missing completely which makes no sense to me (I double and triple checked)
R7012: 1 kOhm

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
"R7011: 330 Ohm"
Do you mean onboard value?
Remove C7011.
If you still get the same value, change U7000.

"C7011: 0 uF"
I was not thinking on its capacity...

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
[B][I]"R7011: 330 Ohm"
Do you mean onboard value?

"C7011: 0 uF"
I was not thinking on its capacity...[/I][/B]

Were you asking about short to ground or?

Sorry, new to this but I do appreciate your time.
After your response I usually spend time looking at the schematic to figure how and why to ask the same question you did.

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
ACIN input measured on diode mode gave very low value on your board.
Only two options available:
- C7011 leakage, can be discarded measuring after removed.
- U7000 internal problems and needs change.

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
And:

R7013 is missing completely ? any idea why. It is not a NOSTUFF on this board

threads.title: 820-2850 A No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
R7012/13 can NOT be present at same time.
R7012 is for 3 cells battery and R7013 for 2 cells battery.
If none present, U7000 will deliver aprox 4V on PPBUS_G3H; it will suppose 1 cell battery present...
